means: 除…臭，防臭( deodorize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Even the cat litter sections poses a multitude of burning questions. Deodorized?
sentence.Network_cn: 甚至连猫窝垫都向人提出许多尖锐问题--防臭的?

sentence.Network_en: In this paper , the adsorption of diatomaceous earth which is applied to deodorized paper is determined.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了填加硅藻土作除臭纸的除臭效果.

entry.tran: 除去…的臭味;脱去…的异味
entry.def: If you deodorize something, you remove unpleasant smells from it.

example.ex: The machine uses minute quantities of ozone to sterilise and deodorise refrigerated food vehicles.
example.tran: 这种机器使用极少量的臭氧为食品冷藏车消毒杀菌和去除异味。
